latex:
Let\\
\\
\[ T = \frac1{3-\sqrt8} - \frac1{\sqrt8 - \sqrt7} + \frac1{\sqrt7-\sqrt6} - \frac1{\sqrt6-\sqrt5} + \frac1{\sqrt5-2}\]\\
\\
then\\
\\
$ \textbf{(A)}\ T<1 \qquad 
\textbf{(B)}\ T=1 \qquad 
\textbf{(C)}\ 1<T<2 \qquad 
\textbf{(D)}\ T>2 \qquad$\\
$ \textbf{(E)}\ T = \frac1{(3-\sqrt8)(\sqrt8-\sqrt7)(\sqrt7-\sqrt6)(\sqrt6-\sqrt5)(\sqrt5-2)}$
